Responses are JSON encoded and contain one or two top-level keys (
for successful requests or those with warnings, or only error for failed or rejected requests)

HTTP status codes are generally not used by our API to convey information about the state of requests â€“ any errors or warnings are denoted in the error field of the response as described above. Status codes other than 200 indicate that there was an issue with the request reaching our servers.
can be any text string that describes the reason for the error
